overview: Martin Vivas is a Graphic & Editorial Designer, entrepreneur, and Consultant. He working in editorial business for over 15 years, as illustrator, designer, director and even as founder. He collaborates as Facilitator in Palermovalley, the web-professionals community in LatAm. Since 2008 Martin is Leader team in the Palermo-Valley-Night the bigger grass-root geek events in LatAm. 6 times at year, all Community comming there (Developers, VCs, Designers, Marketing guys, etc.) 600 people attend each event, more 10.000 attendees at all. In Addition he coordinated the creation and communication of communities for more of 40 cities (in the palermovalley scheme). Has been a organizer collaborator and speaker in various events and communities in LatAm. Martin co-founded BA Accelerator with Vanesa Kolodziej in 2011.
